basAliasTcpMib.name: basAliasTcpMib
basAliasTcpMib.contactinfo: Tech Support Broadband Access Systems 201 Forest Street Marlboro, MA 01752 U.S.A. 508-485-8200 support@basystems.com
basAliasTcpMib.description: This module defines the MIB objects for a Broadband Access System IP Forwarding component.

basTcpRtoAlgorithm.name: basTcpRtoAlgorithm
basTcpRtoAlgorithm.description: The algorithm used to determine the timeout value used for retransmitting unacknowledged octets.

basTcpRtoMin.name: basTcpRtoMin
basTcpRtoMin.description: The minimum value permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission timeout, measured in milliseconds. More refined semantics for objects of this type depend upon the algorithm used to determine the retransmission timeout. In particular, when the timeout algorithm is rsre(3), an object of this type has the semantics of the LBOUND quantity described in RFC 793.

basTcpRtoMax.name: basTcpRtoMax
basTcpRtoMax.description: The maximum value permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission timeout, measured in milliseconds. More refined semantics for objects of this type depend upon the algorithm used to determine the retransmission timeout. In particular, when the timeout algorithm is rsre(3), an object of this type has the semantics of the UBOUND quantity described in RFC 793.

basTcpMaxConn.name: basTcpMaxConn
basTcpMaxConn.description: The limit on the total number of TCP connections the entity can support. In entities where the maximum number of connections is dynamic, this object should contain the value -1.

basTcpActiveOpens.name: basTcpActiveOpens
basTcpActiveOpens.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state.

basTcpPassiveOpens.name: basTcpPassiveOpens
basTcpPassiveOpens.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state.

basTcpAttemptFails.name: basTcpAttemptFails
basTcpAttemptFails.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the SYN-SENT state or the SYN-RCVD state, plus the number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the LISTEN state from the SYN-RCVD state.

basTcpEstabResets.name: basTcpEstabResets
basTcpEstabResets.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the ESTABLISHED state or the CLOSE-WAIT state.

basTcpCurrEstab.name: basTcpCurrEstab
basTcpCurrEstab.description: The number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT.

basTcpInSegs.name: basTcpInSegs
basTcpInSegs.description: The total number of segments received, including those received in error. This count includes segments received on currently established connections.

basTcpOutSegs.name: basTcpOutSegs
basTcpOutSegs.description: The total number of segments sent, including those on current connections but excluding those containing only retransmitted octets.

basTcpRetransSegs.name: basTcpRetransSegs
basTcpRetransSegs.description: The total number of segments retransmitted - that is, the number of TCP segments transmitted containing one or more previously transmitted octets.

basTcpChassis.name: basTcpChassis
basTcpChassis.description: The BAS Chassis ID of the Route Server.

basTcpSlot.name: basTcpSlot
basTcpSlot.description: The BAS Slot ID of the Route Server.

basTcpIf.name: basTcpIf
basTcpIf.description: The BAS interface ID of the Route Server.

basTcpLPort.name: basTcpLPort
basTcpLPort.description: The BAS logical port ID of the Route Server.

basTcpConnTable.name: basTcpConnTable
basTcpConnTable.description: A table containing TCP connection-specific information.

basTcpConnEntry.name: basTcpConnEntry
basTcpConnEntry.description: A conceptual row of the tcpConnTable containing information about a particular current TCP connection. Each row of this table is transient, in that it ceases to exist when (or soon after) the connection makes the transition to the CLOSED state.

basTcpConnState.name: basTcpConnState
basTcpConnState.description: The state of this TCP connection. The only value which may be set by a management station is deleteTCB(12). Accordingly, it is appropriate for an agent to return a `badValue' response if a management station attempts to set this object to any other value. If a management station sets this object to the value deleteTCB(12), then this has the effect of deleting the TCB (as defined in RFC 793) of the corresponding connection on the managed node, resulting in immediate termination of the connection. As an implementation-specific option, a RST segment may be sent from the managed node to the other TCP endpoint (note however that RST segments are not sent reliably).

basTcpConnLocalAddress.name: basTcpConnLocalAddress
basTcpConnLocalAddress.description: The local IP address for this TCP connection. In the case of a connection in the listen state which is willing to accept connections for any IP interface associated with the node, the value 0.0.0.0 is used.

basTcpConnLocalPort.name: basTcpConnLocalPort
basTcpConnLocalPort.description: The local port number for this TCP connection.

basTcpConnRemAddress.name: basTcpConnRemAddress
basTcpConnRemAddress.description: The remote IP address for this TCP connection.

basTcpConnRemPort.name: basTcpConnRemPort
basTcpConnRemPort.description: The remote port number for this TCP connection.

basTcpConnChassis.name: basTcpConnChassis
basTcpConnChassis.description: The BAS Chassis ID of the Route Server.

basTcpConnSlot.name: basTcpConnSlot
basTcpConnSlot.description: The BAS Slot ID of the Route Server.

basTcpConnIf.name: basTcpConnIf
basTcpConnIf.description: The BAS interface ID of the Route Server.

basTcpConnLPort.name: basTcpConnLPort
basTcpConnLPort.description: The BAS logical port ID of the Route Server.

basTcpStatsTable.name: basTcpStatsTable
basTcpStatsTable.description: A list of Route Server forwarding table distribution mechanism statistics.

basTcpInErrs.name: basTcpInErrs
basTcpInErrs.description: The total number of segments received in error (e.g., bad TCP checksums).

basTcpOutRsts.name: basTcpOutRsts
basTcpOutRsts.description: The number of TCP segments sent containing the RST flag.

basTcpStatsChassis.name: basTcpStatsChassis
basTcpStatsChassis.description: The BAS Chassis ID of the Route Server.

basTcpStatsSlot.name: basTcpStatsSlot
basTcpStatsSlot.description: The BAS Slot ID of the Route Server.

basTcpStatsIf.name: basTcpStatsIf
basTcpStatsIf.description: The BAS interface ID of the Route Server.

basTcpStatsLPort.name: basTcpStatsLPort
basTcpStatsLPort.description: The BAS logical port ID of the Route Server.
